short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to change the background color of a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Background Changer is a lightweight Chrome extension that allows users to quickly change the background color of any web page to enhance readability or reduce eye strain. With a user-friendly interface and multiple color options, this tool is perfect for those who prefer a customized browsing experience. Whether you're reading late at night or just want a fresh look, this extension makes it easy to switch things up. No technical knowledge requiredâ€”just click and apply.
